mapper.insert: insert into copypaste.content (text, ip, browser) value (#{text}, inet_aton(#{ip}), #{browser});
mapper.select: select id, text, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime, inet_ntoa(ip) as ip, browser from copypaste.content where id = #{id} limit 1
